text: DEUS heard everything 2 DE VOS discussed DEUS est Hearer Seer. [58:2] Those among vos estrange their uxor (de declaring them prout forbidden in genus) their mater know foderator bene ut they non est their mater! Their mater est femina dedit genitus to them. Indeed they committing blasphemy falsehood. DEUS est Pardoner Forgiver
